body_html:
@jart: note that the dockerfile checks out the r0.11 branch, rather than running the repository at the revision you have checked out, so this could be some weird interaction there. When I do a docker build with r0.11 as the repository-outside-of-docker, it's fine, but not with 446b1cb, even though inside docker it should be building exactly the same thing (r0.11).

tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/docker/Dockerfile.devel-gpu

Line 86 in 7de3419

git checkout r0.11

When I do a docker build with r0.11 as the repository-outside-of-docker, it's fine, but not with 446b1cb, even though inside docker it should be building exactly the same thing (r0.11).

body:
@jart: note that the dockerfile checks out the r0.11 branch, rather than running the repository at the revision you have checked out, so this could be some weird interaction there. When I do a docker build with `r0.11` as the repository-outside-of-docker, it's fine, but not with 446b1cb, even though inside docker it should be building exactly the same thing (r0.11).

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/7de3419cd7504ebd94eaad273f9919eff334ece7/tensorflow/tools/docker/Dockerfile.devel-gpu#L86
